actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to clarify the status of nonappropriated fund personnel at the U.S. Merchant Marine Academy.

summary.text: States that nonappropriated fund personnel at the United States Merchant Marine Academy are not employees for the purpose of laws administered by the Civil Service Commission. (Amends 5U.S.C. 2105(c))

titles.title: A bill to clarify the status of nonappropriated fund personnel at the U.S. Merchant Marine Academy.
